entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 25 March 2023
